hints.content:
Let's use a place value chart to write $\tealD{\text{fifty thousand,}} \blueD{\text{ six hundred}} \purpleC{\text{ thirty-}}\greenD{\text{one}}$ in standard form.

Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens |  Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\tealD5$ | $\tealD0$| $\blueD6$ | $\purpleC3$ | $\greenD1$
"Fifty thousand, six hundred thirty-one" in standard form is $50{,}631$.
